items.sentence: It wasn\'t long before I got a call from Tom.
It would\'ve been better not to say anything.
It wouldn\'t be safe to go there by yourself.
You\'ve worked with Tom before, haven\'t you?
It may already be too late for us to do that.
It might make things easier if Tom helped us.
It seemed like the only rational thing to do.
Do you think that you could help me fix this?
Tom told Mary he didn\'t have anything to do.
Tom told Mary he didn\'t have to do anything.
Tom had better do what he\'s been told to do.
I told Tom that I wanted to eat Chinese food.
I told Tom where he should put his suitcases.
My house is on the other side of that bridge.
Tom seems to be trying to change the subject.
Tom didn\'t know Mary needed to go yesterday.
There weren\'t many people at Tom\'s concert.
My doctor told me I shouldn\'t drive anymore.
It was the worst pain I had ever experienced.
I wish you\'d told me the car was out of gas.
